summary: An Edinburgh professor and assorted colleagues follow an explorer's trail down an extinct Icelandic volcano to the earth's center.
cast: Pat Boone|James Mason|Arlene Dahl|Diane Baker|Thayer David|Peter Ronson|Robert Adler|Alan Napier|Mary Brady|Alan Caillou|Gertrude the Duck|John Epper|Edith Evanson|Alex Finlayson|Molly Glessing|Frederick Halliday|Kendrick Huxham|Owen McGiveney|Molly Roden|Bert Stevens|Ivan Triesault|Red West|Peter Wight|Ben Wright
keywords: male male relationship|implied male nudity|manipulative female|based on the works of jules verne|underground ocean
title: Viaje al centro de la Tierra
